text: % Delayed skeletal maturation 7.5% High anterior hairline 7.5% Ichthyosis 7.5% Muscle weakness 7.5% Peripheral neuropathy 7.5% Macular dystrophy 5% Amelogenesis imperfecta - Autosomal recessive inheritance - Hypoplasia of dental enamel - Leukonychia - The Human Phenotype Ontology (HPO) has collected information on how often a sign or symptom occurs in a condition. Much of this information comes from Orphanet, a European rare disease database. The frequency of a sign or symptom is usually listed
